title: Eletric Go
description:
Optimization of delivery routes using electric trucks for warehouse distribution, offering RESTful services, a user-friendly interface, and a 3D visualization of the network.
It employs genetic algorithms for efficient route planning while adhering to charging rules.

title: Slippage Saver
description:
The project entailed developing two expert systems to aid financial auditors in identifying financial irregularities by analyzing annual company financial data such as balance sheets and income statements.
One system is built in Prolog, and the other in Java using Drools. Both of these expert systems are available in an Angular user-friendly interface.

title: SchedulExp
description: Created a to-do list application with CRUD functionality using React and Firebase.

title: Morny
description: Designed and implemented a personal portfolio website showcasing projects, skills, and experience.
